events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your website, but I would like to request a refund because the size was incorrect and it doesn't fit me at all.
The customer's message mentions a refund request due to product sizing, so the issue is categorized under Refund.
The case has been assigned to support agent Alice Thompson to handle the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your jacket. I'm here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm that the jacket has not been worn or damaged so we can proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 789654123. The jacket is brand new, I haven't worn it outside and the tags are still attached.
Thank you for the information. You can return the jacket using the prepaid shipping label we will email you shortly. Once we receive it, a full refund will be issued.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate having the prepaid label sent to me, this makes the process much easier.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just following up to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
Since you have confirmed receipt of the refund and no further issues were indicated, we are closing this case now. Thank you for shopping with us.
